| HistoryText             = [[Hercules Panhellenios (Earth-616)|Hercules]] called his gods and demigods friends from around the globe to join the team that he was putting back together; the Gods of War, with hopes of stopping the new gods known as the [[Uprising Storm (Earth-616)|The Uprising Storm]]. The team included [[Sigurd (Bor) (Earth-616)|Sigurd]], [[Lorelei (Earth-616)|Lorelei]], [[Theseus (Earth-616)|Theseus]], [[Beowulf (Earth-616)|Beowulf]] and his already allies [[Ire (Earth-616)|Ire]], [[Gilgamesh (Earth-616)|Gilgamesh]] and [[Tiresias (Earth-616)|Tiresias]]. But before the meeting could end the Uprising Storm attacked. Beowulf battled [[Catastrophobia (Earth-616)|Catastrophobia]] but was no match for the new god. Theseus gloated after shooting Catastrophobia with a rifle believing he saved Wulfie's life, but the new god just stood back up.{{r|Civil War II: Gods of War #2}}

After failing to defeat them in previous battle, Hercules and the Gods of War decided to attack the Uprising Storm in their hideout. Thanks to the combine magic of Lorelei and Ire they managed to weakened the New Gods’ powers and after a fierce battle they were successful in destroying them forever.{{r|Civil War II: Gods of War #4}}

| Notes                   = Many gods were proposed but didn't joined the Gods of War:
* [[Rostam (Earth-616)|Rostam]], [[Sun Wukong (Earth-616)|Sun Wukong]] and [[Oduduwa (Earth-616)|Oduduwa]] were proposed by [[Gilgamesh (Earth-616)|Gilgamesh]].{{r|Civil War II: Gods of War #1}}
** Rostam had been proposed earlier by Gilgamesh (along with [[Theseus (Earth-616)|Theseus]] and [[Beowulf (Earth-616)|Beowulf]]) when he felt unfit to fight alongside [[Hercules Panhellenios (Earth-616)|Hercules]].{{r|Hercules Vol 4 3}}
* [[Achilles (Earth-616)|Achilles]] was proposed by [[Tiresias (Earth-616)|Tiresias]], but was dead ("again?") at that time.{{r|Civil War II: Gods of War #1}}
* [[Sétanta (Earth-616)|Cú Chulainn]] was proposed by Tiresias, but was deemed too blood-thirsty by Hercules.{{r|Civil War II: Gods of War #1}}
* [[Krishna (Earth-616)|Krishna]] and [[Rama (Earth-616)|Rama]] were proposed by [[Ire (Earth-616)|Ire]], approved by Gilgamesh.{{r|Civil War II: Gods of War #1}}
* [[Arthur Pendragon (Earth-616)|Arthur]], along with [[Sir Bors (Earth-616)|Bors]] and [[Sir Galahad (Earth-616)|Galahad]], was proposed by Tiresias, but Hercules stated he was sleeping at that time.{{r|Civil War II: Gods of War #1}}
| Trivia                  = * Hercules stated he was putting the Gods of War ''"back together"'',{{r|Civil War II: Gods of War #1}} hinting the team had already existed before.
